verses.verse: Awake <WH5782>, awake <WH5782>; put on <WH3847> thy strength <WH5797>, O Zion <WH6726>; put on <WH3847> thy beautiful <WH8597> garments <WH899>, O Jerusalem <WH3389>, the holy <WH6944> city <WH5892>: for henceforth there shall no more <WH3254> come <WH935> into thee the uncircumcised <WH6189> and the unclean <WH2931>.

Shake <WH5287> thyself from the dust <WH6083>; arise <WH6965>, and sit down <WH3427>, O Jerusalem <WH3389>: loose <WH6605> thyself from the bands <WH4147> of thy neck <WH6677>, O captive <WH7628> daughter <WH1323> of Zion <WH6726>.
For thus saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068>, Ye have sold <WH4376> yourselves for nought <WH2600>; and ye shall be redeemed <WH1350> without money <WH3701>.

For thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>, My people <WH5971> went down <WH3381> aforetime <WH7223> into Egypt <WH4714> to sojourn <WH1481> there; and the Assyrian <WH804> oppressed <WH6231> them without cause <WH657>.

Now therefore, what have I here, saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068>, that my people <WH5971> is taken away <WH3947> for nought <WH2600>? they that rule <WH4910> over them make them to howl <WH3213>, saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068>; and my name <WH8034> continually <WH8548> every day <WH3117> is blasphemed <WH5006>.
Therefore my people <WH5971> shall know <WH3045> my name <WH8034>: therefore they shall know in that day <WH3117> that I am he that doth speak <WH1696>: behold, it is I.

How beautiful <WH4998> upon the mountains <WH2022> are the feet <WH7272> of him that bringeth good tidings <WH1319>, that publisheth <WH8085> peace <WH7965>; that bringeth good tidings <WH1319> of good <WH2896>, that publisheth <WH8085> salvation <WH3444>; that saith <WH559> unto Zion <WH6726>, Thy God <WH430> reigneth <WH4427>!

Thy watchmen <WH6822> shall lift up <WH5375> the voice <WH6963>; with the voice <WH6963> together <WH3162> shall they sing <WH7442>: for they shall see <WH7200> eye <WH5869> to eye <WH5869>, when the LORD <WH3068> shall bring again <WH7725> Zion <WH6726>.

Break forth into joy <WH6476>, sing <WH7442> together <WH3162>, ye waste places <WH2723> of Jerusalem <WH3389>: for the LORD <WH3068> hath comforted <WH5162> his people <WH5971>, he hath redeemed <WH1350> Jerusalem <WH3389>.

The LORD <WH3068> hath made bare <WH2834> his holy <WH6944> arm <WH2220> in the eyes <WH5869> of all the nations <WH1471>; and all the ends <WH657> of the earth <WH776> shall see <WH7200> the salvation <WH3444> of our God <WH430>.

Depart <WH5493> ye, depart <WH5493> ye, go ye out <WH3318> from thence, touch <WH5060> no unclean <WH2931> thing; go ye out <WH3318> of the midst <WH8432> of her; be ye clean <WH1305>, that bear <WH5375> the vessels <WH3627> of the LORD <WH3068>.

For ye shall not go out <WH3318> with haste <WH2649>, nor go <WH3212> by flight <WH4499>: for the LORD <WH3068> will go <WH1980> before <WH6440> you; and the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> will be your rereward <WH622>. be: Heb. gather you up
Behold, my servant <WH5650> shall deal prudently <WH7919>, he shall be exalted <WH7311> and extolled <WH5375>, and be very <WH3966> high <WH1361>. deal: or, prosper
As many <WH7227> were astonied <WH8074> at thee; his visage <WH4758> was so marred <WH4893> more than any man <WH376>, and his form <WH8389> more than the sons <WH1121> of men <WH120>:

So shall he sprinkle <WH5137> many <WH7227> nations <WH1471>; the kings <WH4428> shall shut <WH7092> their mouths <WH6310> at him: for that which had not been told <WH5608> them shall they see <WH7200>; and that which they had not heard <WH8085> shall they consider <WH995>.
